info.name: Teacher App API
info.description: API collection for Smart Campus Teacher App

response.name: Success Response
Success Response
Success Response

request.description: Get all classes scheduled for today with their status and basic info.
Get detailed information for a today's class. Response varies based on status (ongoing/upcoming/completed).

response.name: Ongoing Class Response

request.description: Take attendance for an ONGOING class. Status values: present, absent, leave, late
Update curriculum progress by marking a topic as completed or not completed.
Add a class remark. Type values: positive, concern, note

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Add a student remark. Type values: positive, concern, note

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Assign homework for the class.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Collect homework submissions. Status values: submitted, not_submitted, late
Get a summary of all data recorded during the ongoing class session. This is used to show the 'Class Summary' modal before the teacher ends the class, allowing them to review what was recorded.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: End an ongoing class with optional notes.

response.name: Success Response

query.description: Optional: Search by student name or roll number

request.description: Get all students in a class with optional search and gender filtering.

item.name: Get Attendance Dropdown
item.description:
Returns classes with today's first period info for attendance.

Response includes:
- id: class UUID
- label: class name (e.g. 'Grade 7 A')
- current_period_id: first period of today (null if no period today)
- start_time: period start time (e.g. '10:00')
- end_time: period end time (e.g. '10:45')
- subject: subject name (e.g. 'Myanmar')
- students_count: number of students

query.description: Optional: Date (YYYY-MM-DD) to apply accepted switch requests for that day

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Teacher clicks on another teacher's period and requests to switch. The teacher selects their own subject to teach during that period.

response.name: Success Response

query.description: Optional: Month (1-12), defaults to current month
Optional: Year, defaults to current year
Week start date (Sunday) in YYYY-MM-DD format
Week end date (Saturday) in YYYY-MM-DD format

request.description: Get class records for a specific week. Week starts on Sunday and ends on Saturday.
Get detailed information for a specific class record including attendance details and class info.

Update an existing class remark. Only the teacher who created the remark can update it.

query.description: Optional: Date to get summary for (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to today.

request.description: Get a comprehensive activity summary for a class on a specific date. Includes attendance, class remarks, student remarks, curriculum updates, and homework assigned.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Register a device token for push notifications. Platform can be: ios, android, web
Remove a device token (typically called on logout)

query.description: Set to true to get only unread notifications

request.description: Get paginated list of notifications for the authenticated user

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Get the count of unread notifications (useful for badge display)
Mark a specific notification as read
Mark all notifications as read
Get list of available activity types for free period recording

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Record teacher's activities during a free period. Supports multiple activities in one request - teachers can log different activity types for the same time slot.

response.name: Success Response (Single Activity)
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "1 activity(ies) recorded successfully",
    "data": {

}
